attributes.action: create a small amount of funding for young drivers to get into motorsport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In some countries there is funding for motorsport which is for young drivers ,race tracks Ect. 
The UK does not have any funding for motorsport and this causes heartbreak for young drivers who's family's do not have the funding for motorsport.

Motorsport should have funding because it also will create loads of jobs for the UK.
